claim_card.claim: In this Planck PR3 CMB lensing workflow, extending metric analysis with morphology-sensitive observables provides an operational advantage for cohort discrimination.
claim_card.test_hook: Run the same cohort comparison with and without morphology-sensitive diagnostics and compare observed-vs-Gaussian discrimination quality under fixed controls.
